name: Dungeons & Dices
description:
Made for GMTK Gamejam 2022
Theme: Roll of the dice

Play as die on its quest to conquer the kingdom of chess.

Move: ASWD or Arrow keys
Jump/Double jump: Space
Float: Hold Ctrl when jumping
Attack: Release Ctrl
Esc: Exit game

Version info:
Build 1.0 was submitted during GMTK 2022 GameJam
Build 1.1 is first half hour patch (Like I thought, itch.io crashed before I could upload it)
